My Projects

Paytm Clone - Secure Fintech Application

The Paytm Clone is a MERN stack-based digital wallet and payment gateway, offering secure authentication, seamless transactions, and a responsive UI. It uses JWT for authentication, RESTful APIs for efficient data handling, and Tailwind CSS for a sleek design.

Chai Daap - Blockchain-Based Tea Ordering System

Chai Daap is a decentralized tea-ordering system built on Ethereum using Hardhat. It enables seamless, transparent, and secure crypto payments for ordering tea, leveraging smart contracts to handle transactions in a trustless and immutable manner.
